if [ -z "${VERSION}" ] || [ "${VERSION}" == "latest" ]; then
    DOWNLOAD_LINK="https://github.com/${GITHUB_PACKAGE}/releases/download/$LATEST_VERSION/$MATCH"
else 
    DOWNLOAD_LINK="https://github.com/${GITHUB_PACKAGE}/releases/download/v$VERSION/$MATCH"
fi

echo $DOWNLOAD_LINK
wget $DOWNLOAD_LINK

unzip -o Impostor-Server-linux-x64.zip
rm -fR Impostor-Server-linux-x64.zip 
chmod +x Impostor.Server
